title: How To Mentally Time Travel To Create Your Desired Future EP 1306
description:
Ari Wallach is a futurist and the founder and Executive Director of Longpath Labs. He is the author of the book by HarperCollins, Longpath: Becoming the Great Ancestors Our Future Needs. Wallach’s TED talk on the Longpath mindset has been viewed 2.6 million times and translated into 21 languages. He has written for outlets like the BBC and Wired, hosted Fast Company magazine’s “FactCo Futures with Ari Wallach,” and he has been featured in The New Times, CNBC, CNN, Vox, and more. He has served as an advisor to the US State Department, United Nations, and numerous organizations including the RacialEquity2030 Challenge, the Gettysburg Project, and Politico's Long Game Forum. 

More at www.longpath.org

In this Episode, you will learn:

  • What transgenerational empathy really is and why it's so important.
  • How curiosity and creativity can help you to build a longpath mindset.
  • The importance of healing your past in order to create a brighter future.
  • How to visualize your future through mental time travel.

For more, go to: lewishowes.com/1306

The Future of Space Travel w/ Peter Diamandis: EP 1264

The Surprising Secrets to Aging w/ David Sinclair: EP 1232

Embrace the Future w/ Peter Diamandis: EP 881
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
